events.title: Vasco da Gama Sets Sail for India
events.description: Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama departs from Lisbon on his first voyage to India, aiming to establish a sea route to Asia.
events.significance: This voyage opened maritime trade routes between Europe and Asia, significantly impacting global commerce and colonization.

events.title: The Liberty Bell Rings to Mark Independence
events.description: The Liberty Bell rang in Philadelphia to announce the public reading of the Declaration of Independence.
events.significance: The ringing symbolized the birth of the United States and the colonies' declaration of independence from Great Britain.

events.title: Roswell UFO Incident
events.description: An unidentified flying object allegedly crashed near Roswell, New Mexico, sparking widespread UFO and conspiracy theories.
events.significance: This incident became a pivotal event in UFO folklore and influenced pop culture and government secrecy debates.

events.title: NASA's Space Shuttle Atlantis Completes Final Mission
events.description: The space shuttle Atlantis lands, marking the end of NASA's Space Shuttle program after 135 missions.
events.significance: This mission concluded three decades of manned space shuttle flights, transitioning NASA to new exploration initiatives.
